alert.note: Alert for Morgan; Scott (Illinois) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Central Illinois (Central and East Central Illinois)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued April 20 at 3:23PM CDT until April 20 at 4:00PM CDT by NWS Central Illinois
info.description: The National Weather Service in Lincoln has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Scott County in west central Illinois... South central Morgan County in west central Illinois... * Until 400 PM CDT. * At 323 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located 9 miles southeast of Pittsfield, moving east at 45 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * This severe thunderstorm will be near... Alsey around 340 PM CDT. Other locations in the path of this severe thunderstorm include Winchester, Manchester, Murrayville, Woodson and Jacksonville. This includes Interstate 72 between mile markers 50 and 67. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
